map marker pin Our Menu 
Fresh Ingredients. Delicious Dishes. Great Food Made With Quality Ingredients.
Our Menu food menu About us 
A staple on Upper King Street for over a decade, King Street Dispensary is a sports + live music Gastropub & locally loved bar serving a full menu of innovative pub fare and a wide selection of local beer, wine, spirits + seasonally curated cocktails
Read more Private Parties 
Come to celebrate your special event or - give us the opportunity to make your event memorable!
Private Parties 
Reviews

review by - Yelp

Julie M:

My husband and I had three nights in Charleston and we chose to eat here for two of our three dinners because it was that delicious! Everything we ate was delicious but our favorite was the cheese fries! We will definitely go back the next time we are in town.

review by - Yelp

Brian T:

The food here is amazing. I am not a beer drinker, so I can't speak to the bar offerings. I ordered the chicken strips with their parm truffle fries. So delicious! The breading was crisp and flavorful and the fries were perfect! I recommend you check this place out.

review by - Yelp

Sebastian P:

I live in Charleston and I love the new dispensary. The staff is amazing so helpful and nice. The food is very good and reasonably priced for king street. The happy hour is probably one of the best deals on the peninsula. All around wonderful bar/restaurant.

review by - Yelp

Heather E:

I'm a local and Had a great time here! Nelson, the manager was very social and we appreciate his hospitality. Burgers were great. Outside bar is worth checking out. Great happy hour specials too! Definitely check it out

review by - Yelp

Whitney M:

The pretzels are unlike any pretzel in a restaurant. They are crunchy and soft with a different type of salt. The beer cheese was good as well. The hamburger was a $6 special and worth every bit. Even the fries were perfect... everything was unique and delicious that we tried.
